Package main.webapp.servlet

Class ServletController

java.lang.Object
main.webapp.servlet.ServletController
public class ServletController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that serves as a link between all servlets and our model. One is instantiated for each user during the login and is then kept in the context handler to make it accessible from each servlet.

    • addToConfiguration

      public boolean addToConfiguration​(java.lang.String model, int number)
      Second version of the method that add a specified number of the model given as parameter
      Parameters:
      model -
      Returns:
      true if the number of Component with the specified model as parameter is added, otherwise none of them is added.

    • removeFromConfiguration

      public boolean removeFromConfiguration​(java.lang.String model)
      Remove the component with the given model from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      model -
      Returns:
      true if the Component with the specified model as parameter is removed to the configuration. It remove all instances of the same model from the configuration.
